articles.content: There are 50 secrets that you can find in House of Ashes. And, yes, it’s possible to obtain all of them in a single playthrough. However, there are a couple of instances that require specific decisio… [+12182 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Hartley
articles.title: Great British boltholes: A review of the refurbished Green Dragon Hotel, Hereford - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Mail on Sunday's Sarah Hartley checks into Hereford's refurbed Green Dragon Hotel and declares that it's great for entertaining and being entertained.
articles.content:
There's an otherworldly feel to the Green Dragon, as if its been plucked from a 1930s New York neighbourhood and set down in the heart of Hereford.
Perhaps its because of the brick rear with fire es… [+2808 chars]
